greetings.message: "Wishing you a day filled with love, laughter, and endless joy. Happy Birthday!"
"Happy Birthday! May all your dreams and wishes come true today and always."
"Cheers to another fabulous year of being you. Happy Birthday!"
"May this year bring you happiness, health, and success. Happy Birthday!"
"Happy Birthday to someone who brings so much light into the world!"
"Today is all about you—celebrate, enjoy, and have the best birthday ever!"
"Your birthday is a celebration of the amazing person you are. Happy Birthday!"

"Here’s to celebrating you today and always. Happy Birthday!"

"Happy Birthday! Remember, age is just a number… a really big one in your case!"

"Age is merely the number of years the world has been enjoying you. You're welcome!"

"They say the older you get, the wiser you become. So, when’s that going to kick in? Happy Birthday!"

"Happy Birthday! You’re like a software update—slower, but somehow better!"
"Another year older means another year of me laughing at all your jokes… Happy Birthday!"
"Happy Birthday! The candles cost more than the cake at this point, huh?"
"You’re not old—you’re a classic! Like, a really old classic… Happy Birthday!"
"You’ve reached the age where you wake up and everything hurts, even your hair. Happy Birthday!"
"Happy Birthday! Time to celebrate like you’re young… or at least like you think you’re young."

"Happy Birthday! You’ve finally reached the age where your back goes out more than you do!"
"Happy Birthday to the love of my life. Every moment with you is a gift I treasure."
